alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 5:41PM CDT until May 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Central Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fayette, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fayette, Hermanville, Pattison, Blue Hill, Peyton and Red Lick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
